sentences.sContent: Narcissists aren't just attractive to themselves. They are, at least superficially, attractive to other people.
sentences.sContent_eng: Narcissists aren't just attractive to themselves. They are, at least superficially, attractive to other people.
sentences.sCn: 自恋者不只是对自己有吸引力。至少从表面上看，他们对其他人也有吸引力。

sentences.sContent: Chairman Mao famously declared that women hold up half the sky and, superficially at least, went about promoting women into jobs previously designated to men.
sentences.sContent_eng: Chairman Mao famously declared that women hold up half the sky and, superficially at least, went about promoting women into jobs previously designated to men.
sentences.sCn: 毛主席曾宣称，“妇女能顶半边天”，至少在表面上，促使女性进入了以前只有男人才能干的岗位。

words.tran: 表面文章；外表；浅薄的人
浅薄，肤浅；表面性的事物
